ess-beta-metadata.label: Adult obesity prevalence
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Percentage of adults aged 18 and over classified as living with obesity
ess-beta-metadata.sourceOrg: Office for Health Improvement and Disparities
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of adults aged 18 and over classified as living with obesity, in England, for 16/11/2015-15/11/2016 to 16/11/2023-15/11/2024.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats: Adults are defined as living with obesity if their body mass index (BMI) is greater than or equal to 30kg/mÂ².
